entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
